languages.text: Нечто увеличило чувствительность вашей кожи в сотню раз, сделав болезненным даже прикосновение легкого ветерка. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Нечто увеличило чувствительность вашей кожи в сотню раз, сделав болезненным даже прикосновение легкого ветерка. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: Something has increased your skin's sensitivity a hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain.
Something has increased your skin's sensitivity a hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain.
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one-hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain.
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain.
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain.
Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: 何かがあなたの皮膚の感度を100倍に上げた。ちょっと風が吹いただけで、焼けるような痛みを感じるようになった。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 何かがあなたの皮膚の感度を100倍に上げた。ちょっと風が吹いただけで、焼けるような痛みを感じるようになった。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 某种药物将你皮肤的敏感度提高了一百倍。现在哪怕仅仅是一阵微风，也会让你感到灼痛不止。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 某种药物将你皮肤的敏感度提高了一百倍。现在哪怕仅仅是一阵微风，也会让你感到灼痛不止。

languages.text: Algo ha multiplicado por cien la sensibilidad de tu piel. Incluso una brisa ligera te provoca un dolor punzante. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Algo ha multiplicado por cien la sensibilidad de tu piel. Incluso una brisa ligera te provoca un dolor punzante.

languages.text: Irgendetwas hat die Empfindlichkeit deiner Haut um ein Einhundertfaches erhöht. Selbst die kleinste Brise kann nun brennenden Schmerz auslösen. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Irgendetwas hat die Empfindlichkeit deiner Haut um ein Einhundertfaches erhöht. Selbst die kleinste Brise kann nun brennenden Schmerz auslösen.

languages.text: Quelque chose a rendu votre peau une centaine de fois plus sensible. La moindre brise vous inflige une douleur incommensurable. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Quelque chose a rendu votre peau une centaine de fois plus sensible. La moindre brise vous inflige une douleur incommensurable.

languages.text: Bir şey, derinin hassasiyetini yüz kat artırıyor. Sana temas eden en hafif esinti bile şiddetli bir acıya sebep oluyor.
languages.original_text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Bir şey derinin hassasiyetini yüz kat artırıyor. Hafif bir rüzgâr bile şiddetli bir acıya sebep oluyor.

languages.text: Something has upped your skin's sensitivity one hundredfold. Even a slight breeze now causes you searing pain. Can't be removed by normal means.
